EmailTemplate.name: Honda Layout - Discontinued Part(s) (For I/C)
EmailTemplate.subject: Discontinued Part(s) (For I/C)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Discontinued Part(s) (For I/C)
[EN] Hello {!Contact.Name}, Just a quick heads-up to let you know that unfortunately part [ENTER PART #] (DESC) that you had on B/O with us is unfortunately discontinued (back-order cancelled). This was ordered on (Date), reference # [ENTER REFERENCE #] (qty [ENTER QUANTITY]). ------------------- [FR] Bonjour {!Contact.Name}, Cette notification est pour vous aviser que malheureusement la pièce que vous aviez en (C)BO, la [ENTER PART #], est maintenant complètement discontinuée (CBO annulé). Elle était placée sur la commande [ENTER REFERENCE #] (Date), quantité [ENTER QUANTITY].
************************************************************************
Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions | Contact Us
This is a system email account, and unfortunately, replies to this email cannot be acknowledged. If you have any questions or comments please follow this Contact Us link: http://www.honda.ca/contact_us
At Honda, we hold your personal information in strictest confidence, in accordance with federal and provincial guidelines. For further details on Honda's Customer Privacy Policy, please visit our Privacy Policy (http://www.honda.ca/privacy).
© {!YEAR(TODAY())} Honda Canada. 180 Honda Boulevard, Markham, ON, L6C 0H9, 1-888-946-6329
All information contained herein applies to Canadian products only.
